text: this is Bill Cunningham on his halloween
broomstick I traded in the bike first
off it's halloween weekend and the

decided a broom would be better I

some of the happenings that take place
in the city these are pre halloween
obviously and we focused here on the
central park conservancy's halloween
ball that they give every year in a tent
in the park people come in in serious
costume they mean they make an effort
the woman and her husband who won a
first prize made a dress and black net
and then it's all spider webs in red
sequins and the hat and she did it all
herself and then of course Michael
Jackson in all variations here with
Elizabeth Taylor to Michael Jackson's
and it's just a delightful party of
course it's older people and on
twenty-third Street and fifth avenue
they've set up a market and there's a
structure that we would be like a tool

it and then it's all covered with

Victorian Halloween in New York I hate
to give it away but that one place is
Chelsea oh it is today
absolutely enchanting there are no
inflatable halloween mountains the
owners of the houses carve pumpkins and
they line them up on the brownstone
Stoops and they come out usually and
they sit there with a great big bowl of
